trans-unit.source: The WCF Data Services class derived from <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebServiceHost" /> used to instantiate data services.
trans-unit.target: Clase de WCF Data Services derivada de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebServiceHost" /> que se usa para crear instancias de servicios de datos.
[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] no son entidades de servidor autónomo.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the service is a component hosted in an environment such as the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) that provides core server networking facilities.
trans-unit.target: En su lugar, el servicio es un componente hospedado en un entorno, como Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) que proporciona funciones de red de server core.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, a service does not bind to and listen on a network socket for incoming requests to its Representational State Transfer (REST) entry points.
trans-unit.target: En concreto, un servicio no enlazar a y escuchar en un socket de red para las solicitudes entrantes a los puntos de entrada Representational State Transfer (REST).

trans-unit.source: The host handles direct interactions with the network and support caching, scalability, and authentication modules.
trans-unit.target: El host administra las interacciones directas con la red y admite el almacenamiento en caché, las escalabilidad y los módulos de autenticación.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] defines a generic hosting interface <xref:System.Data.Services.IDataServiceHost> that abstracts its implementation from a specific host.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] define una interfaz de hospedaje genérica <xref:System.Data.Services.IDataServiceHost> que abstrae su implementación de un host concreto.

trans-unit.source: This allows [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] to run in a range of hosting environments.
trans-unit.target: Esto permite [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] para que se ejecute en un intervalo de entornos de hospedaje.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Hosting the Data Service](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/hosting-the-data-service-wcf-data-services.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [aloja el servicio de datos](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/hosting-the-data-service-wcf-data-services.md).

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] defines a generic hosting interface <xref:System.Data.Services.IDataServiceHost> that abstracts its implementation from a specific host.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] define una interfaz de hospedaje genérica <xref:System.Data.Services.IDataServiceHost> que abstrae su implementación de un host concreto.

trans-unit.source: This allows [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] to run in a range of hosting environments.
trans-unit.target: Esto permite [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] para que se ejecute en un intervalo de entornos de hospedaje.

trans-unit.source: This interface should not be confused with <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceHost>, which instead handles registration and activation for the service.
trans-unit.target: Esta interfaz no debe confundirse con <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceHost>, que administra el registro y activación para el servicio.

trans-unit.source: A default <xref:System.Data.Services.IDataServiceHost> is used in this case.
trans-unit.target: Valor predeterminado es <xref:System.Data.Services.IDataServiceHost> se usa en este caso.
